channel.title: math on Nomad Blog
channel.description: Recent content in math on Nomad Blog

item.title: Finding equidistant points on a circle
item.description: How to find the positions of a number of equidistant points on a circle, including C++ code to do it for you.

item.title: Lexicographical index calculation
item.description: Finding the index in a container that holds the frequency of elements in lexicographical order. Includes C++ source code for word frequency vectors (that makes use of this index calculation).

item.title: Word frequency vectors and their uses
item.description: Word frequency vectors applied on evolutionary distances between DNA sequences and on bit error rates.
